name: Trello
semantic_context: Create, change and delete boards and cards
natural_language_description: 这是 Trello 节点。主要用于: Create, change and delete boards and cards

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: card

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new list
Get (值: get) - Get the data of a list
Get Cards (值: getCards) - Get all the cards in a list
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many lists

cardId.name: cardId
cardId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Card ID | 作用: The ID of the card | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

url.name: url
url.description: The URL of the attachment to add
url.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source URL | 作用: The URL of the attachment to add | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - Fields to return. Either "all" or a comma-separated list of fields.

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the list to update
id.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | 作用: The ID of the list to update | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the list | (必填项)

description.name: description
description.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: The description of the card

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: idBoard (值: None) - ID of a board the list should be moved to
closed (值: None) - Whether the list is closed
name (值: None) - New name of the list
pos (值: None) - The position of the list. top, bottom, or a positive float.
subscribed (值: None) - Whether the acting user is subscribed to the list

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 20

idMember.name: idMember
idMember.description: The ID of the member to remove from the board
idMember.natural_language_description: 参数名: Member ID | 作用: The ID of the member to remove from the board | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.description: Determines the type of membership the user being added should have
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Determines the type of membership the user being added should have | 默认值: normal | (必填项)
available_options: Normal (值: normal) - Invite as normal member
Observer (值: observer) - Invite as observer (Trello premium feature)

email.name: email
email.description: The ID of the board to update
email.natural_language_description: 参数名: Email | 作用: The ID of the board to update | (必填项)

listId.name: listId
listId.description: The ID of the list to create card in
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | 作用: The ID of the list to create card in | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: Text of the comment | (必填项)

commentId.name: commentId
commentId.description: The ID of the comment to delete
commentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Comment ID | 作用: The ID of the comment to delete | (必填项)

checklistId.name: checklistId
checklistId.description: The ID of the checklist to update
checklistId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Checklist ID | 作用: The ID of the checklist to update | (必填项)

checkItemId.name: checkItemId
checkItemId.description: The ID of the checklist item to update
checkItemId.natural_language_description: 参数名: CheckItem ID | 作用: The ID of the checklist item to update | (必填项)

boardId.name: boardId
boardId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Board | 作用: The ID of the board | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

color.name: color
color.natural_language_description: 参数名: Color | 作用: The color for the label | 默认值: null | (必填项)

archive.name: archive
archive.description: Whether the list should be archived or unarchived
archive.natural_language_description: 参数名: Archive | 作用: Whether the list should be archived or unarchived | 默认值: False

idBoard.name: idBoard
idBoard.description: The ID of the board the list should be created in
idBoard.natural_language_description: 参数名: Board ID | 作用: The ID of the board the list should be created in | (必填项)
